title: Did a Swedish Scientist Propose Cannibalism as a Solution to Climate Change?
subtitle: News websites seized upon remarks made by Magnus Söderlund in September 2019, but climate skepticism (and a language barrier) may have caused confusion.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Magnus Söderlund proposed or advocated eating human flesh as a solution to climate change in remarks he made on Sept. 3, 2019.
